entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
